- Title: Taken (2008))
Plot: Six friends come together to play "The Game" as a celebration of Nick' s birthday. After a few rounds of they get separated while following a black van. It is revealed that the kidnappers are a modern day Jack the Ripper duo, stalking the streets, picking up prostitutes whom they murder and mutilate.
